item.title: Auction House
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

[quote="~Kyle, post:38, topic:350640"][quote author=Tommy Brady link=topic=446997.msg3292525#msg3292525 date=1280716258]

I remember some kind of hat… not a red p hat… was located in that shop that nobody had?

Well what i’m talking about was a red party hat, it was in the shop behind varrock east bank where they sold priest robes. I believe it was only there for a few days and from what I saw sold very few hats(if any).

Does anybody else remember charcoal’s first appearance? I sold those things by the dozens and made millions off people, and then they just became members objects. Hahaha.
[/quote]
Yes, people used to sell them to f2p faggots and told them it’s to trim your armour. I was one of the sellers, unfortunatly. I was a prick back then.[/quote]

I was one of the people that would get scammed. (Because I was like 8 years old.) Luckily I didnt fall for the charcoal …

Read full topic

item.title: Auction House
item.dc:creator: @_Kyle ~Kyle
item.description:
@_Kyle wrote:

[quote=“Tommy Brady, post:37, topic:350640”][quote author=Old Rsc Player link=topic=446997.msg3291599#msg3291599 date=1280638662]
I remember some kind of hat… not a red p hat… was located in that shop that nobody had?
[/quote]

Well what i’m talking about was a red party hat, it was in the shop behind varrock east bank where they sold priest robes. I believe it was only there for a few days and from what I saw sold very few hats(if any).

Does anybody else remember charcoal’s first appearance? I sold those things by the dozens and made millions off people, and then they just became members objects. Hahaha.[/quote]
Yes, people used to sell them to f2p faggots and told them it’s to trim your armour. I was one of the sellers, unfortunatly. I was a prick back then.

Read full topic

item.title: Auction House
item.dc:creator: @Tommy_Brady Tommy Brady
item.description:
@Tommy_Brady wrote:

Old Rsc Player:

I remember some kind of hat… not a red p hat… was located in that shop that nobody had?

Well what i’m talking about was a red party hat, it was in the shop behind varrock east bank where they sold priest robes. I believe it was only there for a few days and from what I saw sold very few hats(if any).

Does anybody else remember charcoal’s first appearance? I sold those things by the dozens and made millions off people, and then they just became members objects. Hahaha.

item.title: Auction House
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

Errorist:

Do you remember when they released planks and tiles into the game? People thought they were going to be for a new skill and started to hoard them. Were tiles every used for anything?

There was suppose to be a new skill… actually a few new skills (what you see today in rs2). Sadly… Jagex had to fuck things away with a “graphics update” (thats when alot of the jagex staff resigned)

Read full topic

item.title: Auction House
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

[quote=“Tommy Brady, post:30, topic:350640”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=446997.msg3290680#msg3290680 date=1280534175]
i remember when they introduced that members priest robe shop on the east side of varrock. a red party hat sold in the shop for like 2gp for a few days but had a massive spawn rate. there was like 200 people there clicking as fast as they could for it to spawn and buy it.
[/quote]

After I seen errorists post I was going to mention that, lol

I was one of the scrubs who sat there clicking, never saw it spawn though.[/quote]

I remember some kind of hat… not a red p hat… was located in that shop that nobody had?

Read full topic
